resources.string: Two teams of three battle in a best-of-five format for fun and PvP rewards.
Objective: Defeat the rival arena team.

Two teams of twenty command rival outposts, competing for fun and PvP rewards. Each team coordinates and balances time defeating rival players, capturing objectives, gathering resources, and building up their outpost.
Objective: Defeat the rival outpost team.
Explore and adventure across Aeternum, unlock the mystery of Azoth, and foil foes that seek to conquer humanityâ€¦ or wipe it from the world.
Complete the Shattered Mountain, Brimstone Sands, and Elysian Wilds Story Arcs
